<a id="PhysicalBoneSimulator3D"></a>

# PhysicalBoneSimulator3D

**Inherits:** [SkeletonModifier3D](SkeletonModifier3D.md) **\<** [Node3D](Node3D.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Node that can be the parent of [PhysicalBone3D](PhysicalBone3D.md) and can apply the simulation results to [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Node that can be the parent of [PhysicalBone3D](PhysicalBone3D.md) and can apply the simulation results to [Skeleton3D](Skeleton3D.md).

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="PhysicalBoneSimulator3D_method_is_simulating_physics"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_simulating_physics**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBoneSimulator3D_method_is_simulating_physics)

Returns a boolean that indicates whether the **PhysicalBoneSimulator3D** is running and simulating.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBoneSimulator3D_method_physical_bones_add_collision_exception"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **physical_bones_add_collision_exception**\ (\ exception\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBoneSimulator3D_method_physical_bones_add_collision_exception)

Adds a collision exception to the physical bone.

Works just like the [RigidBody3D](RigidBody3D.md) node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBoneSimulator3D_method_physical_bones_remove_collision_exception"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **physical_bones_remove_collision_exception**\ (\ exception\: [RID](RID.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBoneSimulator3D_method_physical_bones_remove_collision_exception)

Removes a collision exception to the physical bone.

Works just like the [RigidBody3D](RigidBody3D.md) node.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBoneSimulator3D_method_physical_bones_start_simulation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **physical_bones_start_simulation**\ (\ bones\: [Array](Array.md)\[[StringName](StringName.md)\] = []\ ) [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBoneSimulator3D_method_physical_bones_start_simulation)

Tells the [PhysicalBone3D](PhysicalBone3D.md) nodes in the Skeleton to start simulating and reacting to the physics world.

Optionally, a list of bone names can be passed-in, allowing only the passed-in bones to be simulated.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="PhysicalBoneSimulator3D_method_physical_bones_stop_simulation"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **physical_bones_stop_simulation**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#PhysicalBoneSimulator3D_method_physical_bones_stop_simulation)

Tells the [PhysicalBone3D](PhysicalBone3D.md) nodes in the Skeleton to stop simulating.
